meanings.definition: The area surrounding a farm where animals are kept and farm buildings are located.
meanings.sent1: The farmyard was filled with chickens, cows, and pigs.
meanings.sent2: The farmer fed the animals in the farmyard every morning.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous goat in the farmyard liked to play hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: The farmyard was a bustling community of furry and feathered friends.
meanings.sent5: The farmyard echoed with the sounds of clucking, mooing, and oinking.

meanings.definition: A farmyard can also refer to the animals kept in this area.
meanings.sent1: The noisy farmyard woke up the farmer at the crack of dawn.
meanings.sent2: The children loved to visit the farmyard to pet the friendly animals.
meanings.sent3: The farmyard animals had a meeting to discuss the upcoming harvest.
meanings.sent4: The farmyard resembled a lively zoo with its diverse collection of creatures.
meanings.sent5: The farmyard was a symphony of animal sounds, creating a peaceful atmosphere.
